snippet: Wines from Apulia may be known for their roughly $15 price tags, but they have the potential to reflect the uniqueness of their origins.
abstract: Eric Asimov Wines of The Times column panel tastes red wines from the Apulia region of Italy.
lead_paragraph: Wines from Apulia may be known for their roughly $15 price tags, but they have the potential to reflect the uniqueness of their origins.

headline.print_headline: In Apulia, More Than a Low Price
headline.seo: In Southern Italy, a Chance to Be More Than Just a Bargain
headline.main: In Southern Italy, a Chance to Be More Than Just a Bargain
